name: Post Copyright Plugin
author: Eric T. Benoit

sections.description:
This plugin simply adds a copyright notice to the bottom of every post on
your WordPress site.

Example: (c) Copyright (the year the post was made), (the author), All
Rights Reserved. Written For: (the name of your blog)

More features, like custom text, coming soon.
sections.installation:
1. Upload post-copyright-plugin.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

Tested with 3.5.1…Working

1.0.2

Fixed a minor display bug.

1.0.1

Added links to author and blog names.

1.0

  • This is the first, very simple version.
